sentence.text: Twenty-one genes showed single or cross-cancer associations, including novel associations of succinate metabolic process in melanoma and double-strand break repair via homologous recombination in stomach adenocarcinoma.

entity.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination

sentence.text: The 659 predisposition variants and 18 additional large deletions in tumor suppressors, including protein phosphorylation, double-strand break repair via homologous recombination, and NF1, showed low gene expression and frequent (43%) loss of heterozygosity or biallelic two-hit events.

entity.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination
